abstractive.text: The goal of the project is to design an original, trendy and user-friendly remote control for TV.

abstractive.text: The team comprises the project manager, the marketing expert, who is looking at user needs, the user interface designer, looking at usability, and the industrial designer, working on the engineering and materials.
